body:

And, since I've been playing with the statistics of flaky tests, I can tell you that the probability that a commit will fail this test is 6.5% since it started happening. Assuming the failure is Bernoulli (which looks about right, but I don't have my automatic test working yet :), there's better than even odds that the bug was introduced within 10 commits of the first failure, but you have to go back 44 commits to get to 95% odds.
